scripts.types: fuels typegen -i scripts/*/out/*/*-abi.json -o ./ts-scripts/typegen --script & fuels typegen -i fixtures/*/*-abi.json -o ./ts-scripts/typegen --contract & fuels typegen -i one_delta_orders/*/*/*-abi.json -o ./ts-scripts/typegen --contract & fuels typegen -i order_router/*/*/*-abi.json -o ./ts-scripts/typegen --contract & fuels typegen -i contracts/mocks/mock_token/*/*/*-abi.json -o ./ts-scripts/typegen --contract & fuels typegen -i contracts/logger/*/*/*-abi.json -o ./ts-scripts/typegen --contract
